config-rpm.script:
# Copy certificate(s) to ca-trust folder for c in %{ca-certificates}; do cp -f $c /etc/pki/ca-trust/source/anchors/`basename $c` chmod 644 /etc/pki/ca-trust/source/anchors/`basename $c` done
# update ca trust update-ca-trust extract

# remove certificates from ca-trust folder for c in %{ca-certificates}; do rm -f /etc/pki/ca-trust/source/anchors/`basename $c` done
# update ca trust update-ca-trust extract
